titleStmt.title: The intentions of the armie: concerning the Kings Majestie, for estating him in his rights. Also their desires concerning the Queen, Prince Charles, and the Royall issue, and also for setling of the Parliament in their priviledges, and all subjects in their liberties, and the kingdome in peace.
titleStmt.author: Browne, Richard, Sir, 1602?-1669.
